<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Commoning chain will reduce the register pressure, so we don&#39;t consider about</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the PHI nodes number.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// But commoning chain will increase the addi/add number in the loop and also</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// increase loop ILP. Maximum chain number should be same with hardware</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// IssueWidth, because we won&#39;t benefit from ILP if the parallel chains number</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is bigger than IssueWidth. We assume there are 2 chains in one bucket, so</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// there would be 4 buckets at most on P9(IssueWidth is 8).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Finding the minimal(chain&#95;number + reusable&#95;offset&#95;number) is a complicated</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// algorithmic problem.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For now, the algorithm used here is simply adjusted to handle the case for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// manually unrolling cases.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: use a more powerful algorithm to find minimal sum of chain&#95;number and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// reusable&#95;offset&#95;number for one base with multiple offsets.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PPCLoopInstrFormPrep::prepareBasesForCommoningChains(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/bucket">Bucket</a> &amp;CBucket) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The minimal size for profitable chain commoning:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A1 = base + offset1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A2 = base + offset2 (offset2 - offset1 = X)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A3 = base + offset3</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A4 = base + offset4 (offset4 - offset3 = X)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ======&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// base1 = base + offset1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// base2 = base + offset3</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A1 = base1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A2 = base1 + X</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A3 = base2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A4 = base2 + X</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// There is benefit because of reuse of offest &#39;X&#39;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="#a1b3ad953403b113ea465de585e4fd22b">ChainCommonPrepMinThreshold</a> &gt;= 4 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Thredhold can not be smaller than 4!\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CBucket.<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/bucket/#ad9e30800bdcfb01f891dd1c0e48fd181">Elements</a>.size() &lt; <a href="#a1b3ad953403b113ea465de585e4fd22b">ChainCommonPrepMinThreshold</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We simply select the FirstOffset as the first reusable offset between each</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// chain element 1 and element 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;FirstOffset = CBucket.<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/bucket/#ad9e30800bdcfb01f891dd1c0e48fd181">Elements</a>&#91;1&#93;.Offset;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Figure out how many times above FirstOffset is used in the chain.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For a success commoning chain candidate, offset difference between each</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// chain element 1 and element 0 must be also FirstOffset.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FirstOffsetReusedCount = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Figure out how many times above FirstOffset is used in the first chain.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Chain number is FirstOffsetReusedCount / FirstOffsetReusedCountInFirstChain</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FirstOffsetReusedCountInFirstChain = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EleNum = CBucket.<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/bucket/#ad9e30800bdcfb01f891dd1c0e48fd181">Elements</a>.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SawChainSeparater = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For now, if we meet any offset which is not FirstOffset, we assume we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// find a new Chain.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This makes us miss some opportunities.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For example, we can common:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ChainNum =</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// All elements are increased by FirstOffset.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The number of chains should be sqrt(EleNum).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!SawChainSeparater)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="normal">    ChainNum = (unsigned)sqrt((</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)EleNum);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><Highlight kind="normal">  CBucket.<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/bucket/#a55a60340e951195c3199f98ada0e9eb5">ChainSize</a> = (unsigned)(EleNum / ChainNum);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// commoning chains.), skip now.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CBucket.<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/bucket/#a55a60340e951195c3199f98ada0e9eb5">ChainSize</a> &#42; ChainNum != EleNum)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PPCLoopInstrFormPrep::prepareBaseForDispFormChain(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/bucket/#a4176c6f98bde7eac732a96a768fbc751">Bucket</a> &amp;BucketChain,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                       <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/#ace83c0b2fc7de869e3b41692c29c0fda">PrepForm</a> Form) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// RemainderOffsetInfo details:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// key:            value of (Offset urem DispConstraint). For DSForm, it can</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                 be &#91;0, 4).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// first of pair:  the index of first BucketElement whose remainder is equal</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                 to key. For key 0, this value must be 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// second of pair: number of load/stores with the same remainder.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;unsigned, std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt;</a>&gt; RemainderOffsetInfo;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> j = 0, je = BucketChain.Elements.size(); j != je; ++j) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!BucketChain.Elements&#91;j&#93;.Offset)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><Highlight kind="normal">      RemainderOffsetInfo&#91;0&#93; = std::make&#95;pair(0, 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Remainder = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;SCEVConstant&gt;</a>(BucketChain.Elements&#91;j&#93;.Offset)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><Highlight kind="normal">                               -&gt;getAPInt()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><Highlight kind="normal">                               .urem(Form);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!RemainderOffsetInfo.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a836d9cba6deced0bb1fa7333ce5afd3a">contains</a>(Remainder))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><Highlight kind="normal">        RemainderOffsetInfo&#91;Remainder&#93; = std::make&#95;pair(j, 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><Highlight kind="normal">        RemainderOffsetInfo&#91;Remainder&#93;.second++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Currently we choose the most profitable base as the one which has the max</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// number of load/store with same remainder.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: adjust the base selection strategy according to load/store offset</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// distribution.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For example, if we have one candidate chain for DS form preparation, which</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// contains following load/stores with different remainders:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1: 10 load/store whose remainder is 1;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 2: 9 load/store whose remainder is 2;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 3: 1 for remainder 3 and 0 for remainder 0;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now we will choose the first load/store whose remainder is 1 as base and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// adjust all other load/stores according to new base, so we will get 10 DS</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// form and 10 X form.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// But we should be more clever, for this case we could use two bases, one for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// remainder 1 and the other for remainder 2, thus we could get 19 DS form and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1 X form.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxCountRemainder = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> j = 0; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea363b122c528f54df4a0446b6bab05515">j</a> &lt; (unsigned)Form; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea363b122c528f54df4a0446b6bab05515">j</a>++)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"><Highlight kind="normal">      MaxCountRemainder = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea363b122c528f54df4a0446b6bab05515">j</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the first value is most profitable, no needed to adjust BucketChain</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// elements as they are substracted the first value when collecting.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="969"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: implement a more clever base choosing policy.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="970"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Currently we always choose an exist load/store offset. This maybe lead to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="971"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// suboptimal code sequences. For example, for one DS chain with offsets</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="972"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#123;-32769, 2003, 2007, 2011&#125;, we choose -32769 as base offset, and left disp</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="973"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for load/stores are &#123;0, 34772, 34776, 34780&#125;. Though each offset now is a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="974"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// multipler of 4, it cannot be represented by sint16.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="975"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PPCLoopInstrFormPrep::prepareBaseForUpdateFormChain(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/bucket/#a4176c6f98bde7eac732a96a768fbc751">Bucket</a> &amp;BucketChain) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="976"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We have a choice now of which instruction&#39;s memory operand we use as the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="977"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// base for the generated PHI. Always picking the first instruction in each</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="978"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// bucket does not work well, specifically because that instruction might</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="979"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// be a prefetch (and there are no pre-increment dcbt variants). Otherwise,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="980"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the choice is somewhat arbitrary, because the backend will happily</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="981"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// generate direct offsets from both the pre-incremented and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="982"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// post-incremented pointer values. Thus, we&#39;ll pick the first non-prefetch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="983"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction in each bucket, and adjust the recurrence and other offsets</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1134"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find the loop invariant increment node for SCEV BasePtrIncSCEV.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1135"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// bb.loop.preheader:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1136"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %start = ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1137"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// bb.loop.body:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1138"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %phinode = phi &#91; %start, %bb.loop.preheader &#93;, &#91; %add, %bb.loop.body &#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1139"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1140"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %add = add %phinode, %inc  ; %inc is what we want to get.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1141"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1142"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;PPCLoopInstrFormPrep::getNodeForInc(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;MemI,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1143"><Highlight kind="normal">                                           </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;BasePtrIncSCEV) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
